net.sf.jboard.struts.plugins
Class SecurityPlugin

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.jboard.struts.plugins.SecurityPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.struts.action.PlugIn
public class SecurityPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.struts.action.PlugIn

this class is lauched when the application parse the struts-config.xml file. it initialize the security settings, like the jaas settings.

Version:
$Revision: 1.5 $

Charles Gay
